hints.content:
The first set of blocks shows $\blueE8$ tens and $\blueE0$ ones. 

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/cb904b8817295922a00c931dbbd3b59614cc8815)

There are $\blueE{80}$ blocks.

The second set of blocks shows $\maroonD6$ tens and $\maroonD{3}$ ones. 

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/df04fed2ec3fe3c7f561258363831efa0506a5c9)

So, we are subtracting $\maroonD{63}$ blocks.

When we subtract $\blueE{80}-\maroonD{63}$, the difference is $\blueE{17}$ blocks.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/449e11917781f26b1dee90147c21d3eb829e8c5a)

This equation represents the place value blocks:

$80- 63 = 17$

question.content:
**Which equation can be represented from the place value blocks below?**

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/79569f2c51fbab067134c2150def9d5283884081)

[[☃ radio 1]]
